alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Union (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:41AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Union and southeastern Columbia Counties, Union and northeastern Claiborne Parishes through 830 AM CDT... At 741 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Moro Bay to near El Dorado to Wesson. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Smackover, Norphlet, Huttig, Junction City, Farmerville, Bernice, Strong, Calion, Emerson, Louann, Wesson, Village, Lisbon, Mount Holly, Atlanta, Urbana, Lawson, Cooley, and Lapile. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
